actions.name: Heavy Snow

cost.trigger: The user applies either @Affliction[drowsy] or @Affliction[frostbite] to a creature after hitting with a damaging Psychic or Ice-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user applies either @Affliction[drowsy] or @Affliction[frostbite] to a creature after hitting with a damaging Psychic or Ice-Type attack.

Effect: The user applies both @Affliction[drowsy] and @Affliction[frostbite] for an equal number of Activations.
